item.title: Learning Apache Flink S01E04: A [Partial] Exploration of the Flink SQL Client
item.description: So far I’ve plotted out a bit of a map for my exploration of Apache Flink, looked at what Flink is, and run my first Flink application. Being an absolutely abysmal coder—but knowing a thing or two about SQL—I figure that Flink SQL is where my focus is going to lie (I’m also intrigued by PyFlink, but that’s for another day…).
